title: fix undefined "shipped"
body:
fixes:
```
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php notice:  undefined index: shipped in /srv/http/core/lib/private/app.php on line 775, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/setting
s/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php stack trace:, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   1. {main}() /srv/http/core/index.php:0, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   2. oc::handlerequest() /srv/http/core/index.php:30, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   3. oc_router->match() /srv/http/core/lib/base.php:658, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   4. call_user_func() /srv/http/core/lib/private/router.php:127, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   5. __lambda_func() /srv/http/core/lib/private/router.php:127, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   6. require_once() /srv/http/core/lib/private/route.php(121) : runtime-created function:1, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/
settings/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   7. oc_app::listallapps() /srv/http/core/settings/js/apps-custom.php:19, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?inst
alled
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   8. usort() /srv/http/core/lib/private/app.php:756, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[thu oct 17 11:33:18 2013] [error] [client ::1] php   9. oc_app::customsort() /srv/http/core/lib/private/app.php:756, referer: http://localhost/core/index.php/settings/apps?installed
```

cc @karlitschek
